title: World News Summarization Results
description: Output records containing collected articles, their initial RSS summary, and an AI-generated summary (if available). Records are always pushed, even if content extraction fails.

source.description: The name of the news source (e.g., 'NYT > Top Stories', 'BBC').

title.description: The title of the news article.

url.description: The URL of the original article.

published.description: The publication date/time string from the RSS feed.

content.description: The full, extracted content of the article. This will contain a placeholder message if extraction failed or the URL was filtered.

summary.description: The final summary. This is either the AI-generated summary, the original RSS feed summary, or a fallback message if all summarization/extraction failed.
